Models (models.py)¶

This module has code related to the creation of reaction models.

class models.Model(reaction_factory)¶

This class is responsible for maintaining information about the reactions and initial conditions.

get_all_species()¶

Returns all the species in the model

Returns:A set of strings which give the species’ symbols
get_initial_conditions()¶

Get the initial conditions set on the current Model instance

Returns:A dictionary (one-to-one) of species symbol (string) mapping to initial concentration (float)
get_reactions()¶

Returns all the reactions in this Model instance

Returns:A list of Reaction instances
get_simulation_time()¶

Get the current length of the simulation (in seconds)

Returns:A float, giving the simulation length in seconds
set_initial_conditions(ic)¶

Allows reset of the initial conditions

Parameters:ic – a one-to-one dictionary of species (keys) mapping to initial concentrations (floats)
Returns:None
set_simulation_time(t)¶

Allows set/reset of the simulation time

Parameters:t – A float, greater than zero
Returns:None
